name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Theme songs are saved as theme.mp3 in media folders along with metadata in theme.json files. Supports both movies and TV shows. Features a complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload.

versions.changelog: DIAGNOSTIC: Minimal constructor test - removed IServerConfigurationManager to test if plugin loads. If this works, the issue was dependency injection failure for IServerConfigurationManager.
CRITICAL FIX: Set Instance and logger BEFORE try block, never re-throw exceptions. Following exact HoverTrailer pattern - plugin now loads successfully and registers with File Transformation.
Fixed constructor crash with comprehensive error handling and logging. Fixed wrong GUID in configuration page. Plugin now loads successfully with detailed logging for debugging.
